doc:
Mireille Balin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mireille_Balin 0 Mireille Césarine Balin (born Blanche Mireille Césarine Balin 20 July 1909 in Monte Carlo – 9 November 1968 in Clichy, France) was a French actress. Considered one of the finest actresses of French cinema in the 1930s, she was discredited by her fraternization with the Nazis. Mireille_Césarine_Balin ( born Blanche_Mireille_Césarine_Balin_20_July_1909 in Monte_Carlo – 9_November_1968 in Clichy , France ) was a_French_actress . Considered one of the_finest_actresses of French_cinema in the_1930s , she was_discredited by her_fraternization with the_Nazis .
